trans-unit.source: Provides a default implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService" /> 介面的預設實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService> class is a partial implementation of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService>類別是部分實作<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService>介面。

trans-unit.source: To use this implementation you must derive from this class and implement the abstract methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此實作中，您必須衍生自這個類別並實作抽象方法。

trans-unit.source: Once implemented, you may add this class to your designer application's service container.
trans-unit.target: 實作後，您可以加入這個類別設計工具應用程式的服務容器。

trans-unit.source: There should be one toolbox service for each designer application.
trans-unit.target: 應該要有一個工具箱服務每個設計工具應用程式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService> provides much of the complex logic of creating a toolbox service, but requires that you define the storage containers for categories and items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService> 提供許多複雜的邏輯，建立 [工具箱] 服務，但會要求您定義的分類和項目儲存體容器。

trans-unit.source: This allows for simple toolboxes or very complex ones.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓簡單工具箱或非常複雜的。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings depicting available categories of the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串集合，描述工具箱的可用分類。

trans-unit.source: A collection of category names.
trans-unit.target: 分類名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The category names correspond to various toolbox categories.
trans-unit.target: 類別目錄名稱會對應至不同的工具箱分類。

trans-unit.source: If a toolbox does not implement any form of categories, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CategoryNames%2A> property may return an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [工具箱] 未實作任何形式的分類，<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CategoryNames%2A>屬性可能會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new toolbox item container from a toolbox item or a saved data object.
trans-unit.target: 從工具箱項目或儲存的資料物件建立新的工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: A data object containing saved toolbox data.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件，包含儲存的工具箱資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new toolbox item container from a saved data object.
trans-unit.target: 從儲存的資料物件建立新的工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: A new toolbox item container.
trans-unit.target: 新的工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A> method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A>方法可讓您提供的衍生的版本<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService> class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService>類別不支援連結的項目，以便傳回`null`連結參數不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> that is capable of handling links.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供連結支援，您應該覆寫此方法以建立衍生<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>能夠處理連結。

trans-unit.source: The data object passed in should contain data obtained from a prior call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer.ToolboxData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on a toolbox item container.
trans-unit.target: 傳入的資料物件應該包含在先前呼叫從取得的資料<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer.ToolboxData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>工具箱項目容器上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataObject" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataObject" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.
trans-unit.target: 連結的工具箱項目是其存在繫結至特定的設計工具主應用程式的儲存體。

trans-unit.source: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在典型的專案系統中，設計工具主應用程式都與特定檔案。

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.
trans-unit.target: 當設計工具主應用程式來源檔案遭到刪除，或從專案移除工具箱項目連結至設計工具主應用程式會自動刪除從 [工具箱]。

trans-unit.source: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.
trans-unit.target: 連結的工具箱項目讓可能的案例，例如停用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱項目，開啟 Windows Form 設計工具時。

trans-unit.source: The toolbox item for which to create an item container.
trans-unit.target: 要建立項目容器的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: An optional designer host that should be linked to this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 應連結至這個工具箱項目的選擇性設計工具主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new toolbox item container from a toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 從工具箱項目建立新的工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: A new toolbox item container.
trans-unit.target: 新的工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A> method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A>方法可讓您提供的衍生的版本<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService> class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService>類別不支援連結的項目，以便傳回`null`連結參數不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> that is capable of handling links.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供連結支援，您應該覆寫此方法以建立衍生<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>能夠處理連結。

trans-unit.source: If the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> link parameter is assigned, it indicates that this is a linked toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>連結參數會指派，表示這是連結的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.
trans-unit.target: 連結的工具箱項目是其存在繫結至特定的設計工具主應用程式的儲存體。

trans-unit.source: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在典型的專案系統中，設計工具主應用程式都與特定檔案。

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.
trans-unit.target: 當設計工具主應用程式來源檔案遭到刪除，或從專案移除工具箱項目連結至設計工具主應用程式會自動刪除從 [工具箱]。

trans-unit.source: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.
trans-unit.target: 連結的工具箱項目讓可能的案例，例如停用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱項目，開啟 Windows Form 設計工具時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the toolbox service detects that the active designer’s toolbox item filter has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在工具箱服務偵測到現用設計工具的工具箱項目篩選條件已變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing all items on the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，其中包含工具箱的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The items in the list must be <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在清單中的項目必須是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the toolbox implementation is organized in categories, this retrieves a combined list of all categories.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具箱實作在類別目錄組織，這會擷取合併所有類別目錄的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list must be read/write, as new items may be added to it.
trans-unit.target: 清單必須是讀取/寫入，因為可能會加入新項目。

trans-unit.source: When the toolbox service adds a new item, it first calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A> method and then adds the new item to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> returned from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當工具箱服務加入新項目時，它會先呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.CreateItemContainer%2A>方法，然後新增到新項目<xref:System.Collections.IList>從傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a category name is provided, only the items in that category should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供類別目錄名稱，則只有該分類中的項目應該會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If no category is specified, all items should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何類別，則應該會傳回所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing all items on the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，其中包含工具箱的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing all items on the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，其中包含工具箱的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The category for which to retrieve the item container list.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取項目容器清單的分類。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing all items in a given category.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，其中包含指定分類中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> containing all items in the category specified by <paramref name="categoryName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，其中包含由 <paramref name="categoryName" /> 指定之分類中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: If the category specified by the `categoryName` parameter does not exist, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A> method should throw a meaningful exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的類別目錄`categoryName`參數不存在，<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A>方法應該擲回有意義的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Returns a toolbox item for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定型別的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of component for which to retrieve the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取工具箱項目的元件型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a toolbox item for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定型別的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item associated with the given type, or <see langword="null" /> if the type has no corresponding toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 與指定型別關聯的工具箱項目，但如果該型別沒有對應的工具箱項目，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toolType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toolType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of component for which to retrieve the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取工具箱項目的元件型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search for non-public constructors on the type; <see langword="false" /> to search for public constructors.
trans-unit.target: 若要在型別上搜尋非公用建構函式 (Constructor)，則為 <see langword="true" />，但若要搜尋公用建構函式，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a toolbox item for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定型別的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item associated with the given type, or <see langword="null" /> if the type has no corresponding toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 與指定型別關聯的工具箱項目，但如果該型別沒有對應的工具箱項目，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toolType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toolType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: An assembly name from which to load an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要載入組件的來源組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" /> objects for the given assembly.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定組件之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the assembly represented by the given assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 包含組件中所有工具箱項目的集合，該組件是由指定的組件名稱所表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法掃描支援工具箱項目，並傳回項目，這些類型的所有類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 若要支援的工具箱項目，型別必須具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: Be public.
trans-unit.target: 是公用的。

trans-unit.source: Implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>。

trans-unit.source: Not be abstract.
trans-unit.target: 不能為抽象。

trans-unit.source: Not have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute> set to `false` on its type.
trans-unit.target: 沒有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute>設`false`根據其類型。

trans-unit.source: Not contain generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> can cause many assemblies to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 組件已鎖定持續時間的處理程序，因此列舉透過各種檔案<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>可能會導致許多要載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> methods that take an assembly name create a separate <xref:System.AppDomain> to search assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法會採用組件名稱建立個別<xref:System.AppDomain>搜尋組件。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished enumerating <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A> method, which unloads the <xref:System.AppDomain> and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 完成列舉<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>物件的組件集合，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A>方法，這個方法會卸載<xref:System.AppDomain>並釋放載入的組件上的檔案參考。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies loaded in this manner are loaded into a separate <xref:System.AppDomain> so they can later be unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 以這種方式載入的組件會載入個別<xref:System.AppDomain>以便稍後進行卸載。

trans-unit.source: This only momentarily locks the assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 這只會短暫鎖定的組件檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="an" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="an" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的組件。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the URL location of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 字串，是組件的 URL 位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing all the toolbox items in the given assembly.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，其中包含指定組件中的所有工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the given assembly.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定組件中所有工具箱項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法掃描支援工具箱項目，並傳回項目，這些類型的所有類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 若要支援的工具箱項目，型別必須具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: Be public.
trans-unit.target: 是公用的。

trans-unit.source: Implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>。

trans-unit.source: Not be abstract.
trans-unit.target: 不能為抽象。

trans-unit.source: Not have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute> set to `false` on its type.
trans-unit.target: 沒有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute>設`false`根據其類型。

trans-unit.source: Not contain generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> can cause many assemblies to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 組件已鎖定持續時間的處理程序，因此列舉透過各種檔案<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>可能會導致許多要載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> methods that take an assembly name create a separate <xref:System.AppDomain> to search assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法會採用組件名稱建立個別<xref:System.AppDomain>搜尋組件。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished enumerating <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A> method, which unloads the <xref:System.AppDomain> and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 完成列舉<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>物件的組件集合，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A>方法，這個方法會卸載<xref:System.AppDomain>並釋放載入的組件上的檔案參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="a" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="a" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An assembly name from which to load an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要載入組件的來源組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw an exception on error; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在發生錯誤時擲回例外狀況，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" /> objects for the given assembly.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定組件之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the assembly represented by the given assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 包含組件中所有工具箱項目的集合，該組件是由指定的組件名稱所表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法掃描支援工具箱項目，並傳回項目，這些類型的所有類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 若要支援的工具箱項目，型別必須具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: Be public.
trans-unit.target: 是公用的。

trans-unit.source: Implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>。

trans-unit.source: Not be abstract.
trans-unit.target: 不能為抽象。

trans-unit.source: Not have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute> set to `false` on its type.
trans-unit.target: 沒有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute>設`false`根據其類型。

trans-unit.source: Not contain generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> can cause many assemblies to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 組件已鎖定持續時間的處理程序，因此列舉透過各種檔案<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>可能會導致許多要載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> methods that take an assembly name create a separate <xref:System.AppDomain> to search assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法會採用組件名稱建立個別<xref:System.AppDomain>搜尋組件。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished enumerating <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A> method, which unloads the <xref:System.AppDomain> and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 完成列舉<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>物件的組件集合，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A>方法，這個方法會卸載<xref:System.AppDomain>並釋放載入的組件上的檔案參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="an" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="an" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的組件。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the URL location of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 字串，是組件的 URL 位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw an exception on error; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在發生錯誤時擲回例外狀況，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" /> objects for the given assembly.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定組件之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the assembly represented by the given assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 包含組件中所有工具箱項目的集合，該組件是由指定的組件名稱所表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法掃描支援工具箱項目，並傳回項目，這些類型的所有類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 若要支援的工具箱項目，型別必須具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: Be public.
trans-unit.target: 是公用的。

trans-unit.source: Implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>。

trans-unit.source: Not be abstract.
trans-unit.target: 不能為抽象。

trans-unit.source: Not have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute> set to `false` on its type.
trans-unit.target: 沒有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute>設`false`根據其類型。

trans-unit.source: Not contain generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> can cause many assemblies to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 組件已鎖定持續時間的處理程序，因此列舉透過各種檔案<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>可能會導致許多要載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A> methods that take an assembly name create a separate <xref:System.AppDomain> to search assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetToolboxItems%2A>方法會採用組件名稱建立個別<xref:System.AppDomain>搜尋組件。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished enumerating <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A> method, which unloads the <xref:System.AppDomain> and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 完成列舉<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>物件的組件集合，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.UnloadToolboxItems%2A>方法，這個方法會卸載<xref:System.AppDomain>並釋放載入的組件上的檔案參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="a" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="a" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The data object to examine for the presence of a toolbox item container.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查工具箱項目容器是否存在的資料物件。

trans-unit.source: An optional designer host.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性設計工具主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the given data object represents an item container.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的資料物件是否表示項目容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given data object represents an item container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的資料物件表示項目容器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The data object may directly represent an item container, or there may be a custom toolbox creator that is registered to handle the format contained within the data object.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件直接代表項目容器，或未登錄來處理資料物件內所包含的格式的自訂工具箱建立者。

trans-unit.source: If the `host` parameter is a valid designer host, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.IsItemContainer%2A> method searches toolbox item creators that are associated with the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 如果`host`參數是有效的設計工具主機<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.IsItemContainer%2A>方法會搜尋與設計工具主應用程式相關聯的工具箱項目建立者。

trans-unit.source: If `host` is supplied, toolbox item creators that are associated with the host are also compared.
trans-unit.target: 如果`host`是提供，與主機相關聯的工具箱項目建立者也會比較。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataObject" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataObject" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The toolbox item container.
trans-unit.target: 工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: The given designer host.
trans-unit.target: 指定的設計工具主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the toolbox item container is supported by the given designer host.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的設計工具主應用程式是否支援工具箱項目容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbox item container is supported by the given designer host; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的設計工具主應用程式支援工具箱項目容器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="container" /> or <paramref name="host" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="container" /> 或 <paramref name="host" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理工具箱項目的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.Refresh%2A> method is called by the toolbox service when a user has requested that the collection of items should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.Refresh%2A>方法時，由呼叫工具箱服務使用者已要求應該重新整理的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is always current, there is no need to provide any implementation here.
trans-unit.target: 集合一律都是目前的如果沒有需要提供任何實作。

trans-unit.source: If the collection returned from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A> represents a snapshot of the toolbox items, however, this method provides an opportunity to update them.
trans-unit.target: 如果從集合傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.GetItemContainers%2A>表示快照集的工具箱項目時，不過，這個方法讓您有機會加以更新。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the currently selected category.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前選取之分類的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the currently selected category.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含目前選取之分類的名稱。

trans-unit.source: In general, toolbox items are grouped into categories.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，工具箱項目會以類別目錄分組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected item container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前選取的項目容器。

trans-unit.source: The item container for the currently selected toolbox item, or <see langword="null" /> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取之工具箱項目的項目容器，但如果沒有選取任何項目，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the toolbox service when a user reports that a selected toolbox item has been used.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者報告已使用選取的工具箱項目時，接收來自工具箱服務的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.SelectedItemContainerUsed%2A> method is called by the toolbox service when a user reports that the selected toolbox item has been used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.SelectedItemContainerUsed%2A>方法時，由呼叫工具箱服務報表的使用者已使用選取的工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: After invoking a toolbox item, it is a common user interface (UI) behavior to cancel the selection of that toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 叫用工具箱項目，之後，取消選取 [工具箱] 項目的通用使用者介面 (UI) 行為。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method cancels the selection of the toolbox item by setting the selected item container to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會取消選取工具箱項目設定為選取的項目容器`null`。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current application's cursor to a cursor that represents the currently selected tool.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前應用程式的游標為表示目前選取工具的游標。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is an item selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有選取的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The toolbox service provides support for setting the user interface (UI) cursor to an image that represents the currently selected toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 工具箱服務使用者介面 (UI) 資料指標，將設定為影像，表示目前選取的工具箱項目提供支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.SetCursor%2A> method can be called to set the cursor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxService.SetCursor%2A>方法可以呼叫以設定資料指標。

trans-unit.source: It returns `true` if the cursor is set, or `false` if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回`true`如果設定資料指標，或`false`如果不是。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation sets the cursor to a crosshair and returns `true` if there is an item selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作十字形狀並設定資料指標，並傳回`true`如果沒有選取項目。

trans-unit.source: It returns `false` and leaves the cursor unchanged if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回`false`保持不變，如果不選取任何項目是將資料指標保留。

trans-unit.source: The designer host providing design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段服務的設計工具主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The base type specifying the components to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指定要擷取之元件的基底型別 (Base Type)。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of available component types.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用元件型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of available component types.
trans-unit.target: 可用元件型別的清單。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定資料格式的新工具箱項目建立者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback" /> that can create a component when the toolbox item is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback" />，可以在叫用工具箱項目時建立元件。

trans-unit.source: The data format that the creator handles.
trans-unit.target: 建立者所處理的資料格式。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.AddCreator(System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.AddCreator(System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreatorCallback,System.String)" /> 方法。
